description: Creates a fleet metric. Requires permission to access the CreateFleetMetric action.

parameters.name: metricName
parameters.description: The name of the fleet metric to create.

parameters.name: aggregationType
parameters.description: The type of the aggregation query. The name of the aggregation type. values (list) --- A list of the values of aggregation types. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the aggregation type.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: A list of the values of aggregation types.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The time in seconds between fleet metric emissions. Range [60(1 min), 86400(1 day)] and must be multiple of 60.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata, which can be used to manage the fleet metric. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet metric to create.

nested_items.name: metricArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the new fleet metric.
